sentences.sContent: “I think the Spanish and Italian people are very similar in terms of their character so I feel comfortable here, ” began the Spaniard.
sentences.sContent_eng: “I think the Spanish and Italian people are very similar in terms of their character so I feel comfortable here, ” began the Spaniard.
sentences.sCn: “我认为西班牙人和意大利人性格特征非常相似，因此我在这里感到非常舒适。” 这个西班牙人说。

sentences.sContent: That victory came two weeks after he beat the Spaniard to win the Indian Wells Masters 1000 title.
sentences.sContent_eng: That victory came two weeks after he beat the Spaniard to win the Indian Wells Masters 1000 title.
sentences.sCn: 两周后，他又在1000分系列赛——印第安威尔斯大师赛上击败了西班牙人获得冠军。
